sentences.cn: 对任人唯亲和腐败行为的指控

sentences.en: Cage changed his name to deflect accusations of nepotism.
sentences.cn: 凯奇改了名字以避免别人指责他搞裙带关系。

sentences.en: For example, " Many say Peter got to where he is today because of nepotism. "
sentences.cn: 例如: [ 许多人都说彼得之所以能有今天,就是因为他任人唯亲].

sentences.en: He has an incurable and widespread nepotism.
sentences.cn: 他们有不可救药的,到处蔓延的裙带主义.

sentences.en: Many will regard his appointment as the kind of nepotism British banking ought to avoid.
sentences.cn: 很多人会把他的任命看作是英国银行业应该避免的一种裙带关系。

sentences.en: Normally , biologists explainthis as being either nepotism or you - scratch - my - back - and - I'll - scratch - yours.
sentences.cn: 生物学家一般用裙带关系或者 互帮互助 来解释.

sentences.en: That looked like just the sort of nepotism that the president abhors.
sentences.cn: 看来这正是总统深恶痛绝的裙带关系.

sentences.en: The congressman lashed the president for his nepotism.
sentences.cn: 国会议员抨击总统搞裙带关系.

sentences.en: The imputation that my success was due to nepotism meant that I was not taken seriously.
sentences.cn: 那些说我的成功是靠了裙带关系的诋毁表明我并未受到认真看待.

sentences.en: The problems of poor corporate governance, lack of transparency, and nepotism are not confined to China.
sentences.cn: 公司治理机制问题重重 、 缺乏透明度和裙带关系等现象不只存在于中国.

sentences.en: They ignore my hard work and think my success is due to nepotism.
sentences.cn: 他们完全无视我的努力,认为我的成功来源于裙带关系.

trans.tran_cn: 优待亲戚，重用亲戚，裙带关系
trans.tran_en: the practice of unfairly giving the best jobs to members of your family when you are in a position of power
